summary_md: Ireland, in the year 2024, has a GDP per capita of 91,514 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 2.11% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an unemployment rate of 4.37% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS). The average life expectancy is 82.86 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), and internet usage stands at 96.50% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The country's export growth is at 147.58% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.economy_md: Ireland's economy is characterized by a GDP per capita of 91,514 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD) and an export growth rate of 147.58% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
sections.labor_md: The labor market shows an unemployment rate of 4.37% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), suggesting a relatively stable employment environment.
sections.digital_md: With an internet usage rate of 96.50% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), Ireland demonstrates a strong digital infrastructure.
sections.health_env_md: The average life expectancy in Ireland is 82.86 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), indicating a healthy living environment.
